param.name: Default altitude
param.desc: Altitude to be used if desired Z has no units

param.name: Power Module
param.desc: There is a Power Module installed

param.name: Seconds before Waypoint
param.desc: Seconds before actually reaching Waypoint that it is considered as reached

param.name: Copter - Minimum WP switch radius
param.desc: Used for waypointswitching at copters. Copters uses the seconds before reaching wp, but will also switch if this distance is met.

param.name: RC 1 PWM MIN
param.desc: Min PWM value for Roll channel

param.name: RC 1 PWM MAX
param.desc: Max PWM value for Roll channel

param.name: RC 2 PWM MIN
param.desc: Min PWM value for Climb Rate channel

param.name: RC 2 PWM MAX
param.desc: Max PWM value for Climb Rate channel

param.name: RC 3 PWM MIN
param.desc: Min PWM value for Air Speed channel

param.name: RC 3 PWM MAX
param.desc: Max PWM value for Air Speed channel

param.name: Formation Flight
param.desc: Receive control references from Formation Flight controller

param.name: Formation Flight Entity
param.desc: Entity that sends Formation Flight control references

param.name: Loitering Radius
param.desc: Radius of loitering circle after arriving at destination

param.name: Default Speed
param.desc: Speed to use in case no speed is given by reference source.

param.name: Default Speed Units
param.desc: Units to use for default speed (one of 'm/s', 'rpm' or '%').

param.name: Default Z
param.desc: Default z when no vertical reference is given.

param.name: Loiter -- Minimum Radius
param.desc: Minimum radius for Loiter to prevent incompatibility with path controller

param.name: StationKeeping -- Minimum Radius
param.desc: Minimum radius for StationKeeping to prevent incompatibility with path controller

param.name: YoYo -- Maximum Pitch Variation
param.desc: Maximum pitch variation step when changing z direction

param.name: YoYo -- Check Path Errors
param.desc: True if we should check path errors and stabilize pitch

param.name: Elevator -- Radius Tolerance
param.desc: Distance tolerance to start loitering near elevator's location

param.name: Elevator -- VMonitor -- Minimum Speed
param.desc: Negative values will disable vertical progress monitor

param.name: Elevator -- VMonitor -- Timeout
param.desc: Timeout when progress is below the specified value

param.name: Elevator -- Minimum Radius
param.desc: Minimum radius to prevent incompatibility with path controller

param.name: PopUp -- Minimum Satellites
param.desc: Least number of satellites to accept fixes

param.name: PopUp -- Minimum Distance
param.desc: Minimum distance between gps_fix position and the estimated state

param.name: PopUp -- Maximum Distance From Station
param.desc: Maximum distance from station keeping radial circle

param.name: Dislodge -- Bursts
param.desc: Number of bursts with the motor

param.name: Dislodge -- Minimum Distance
param.desc: Minimum distance to ground or object to stop burst

param.name: Dislodge -- Safe Depth Gap
param.desc: Safe depth change to consider the maneuver was successful

param.name: Execution Frequency
param.desc: Frequência com que a tarefa é executada

param.name: CPU - Moving Average Samples
param.desc: Number of moving average samples to smooth CPU usage

param.name: CPU - Maximum Usage
param.desc: Maximum CPU usage. When this value is hit an error will be raised

param.name: Minimum GPS Fixes
param.desc: Minimum number of GPS fixes required to compute the clock offset

param.name: Maximum Clock Offset
param.desc: Maximum Clock Offset. If the clock offset is above this value the clock will be syncronized

param.name: Boot Synchronization Timeout
param.desc: At boot the system tries to synchronize clocks. It continues unsynched after timeout

param.name: Hardware Clock Synchronization Command
param.desc: System command to execute everytime the clock is synchronized

param.name: Report Timeout
param.desc: Timeout threshold to report Entity error

param.name: Default Monitoring -- Hardware
param.desc: Additional default entities to monitor in Hardware profile

param.name: Maximum Consecutive Transitions
param.desc: Maximum number of consecutive transitions before starting to ignore

param.name: Execution Frequency
param.desc: Frequência com que a tarefa é executada

param.name: Active
param.desc: Verdadeiro para ativar tarefa, falso caso contrário

param.name: Initialization Time
param.desc: Time to wait at beginning before assessing vehicle medium

param.name: Wet Data Timeout
param.desc: No valid wet sensor data timeout

param.name: Wet Data Threshold
param.desc: No valid wet sensor data threshold value

param.name: Air Speed Threshold
param.desc: Minimum air speed necessary to consider a vehicle in air

param.name: Altitude Threshold
param.desc: Minimum altitude necessary to consider a vehicle (Copter) in air

param.name: Entity Label - Medium Sensor
param.desc: Entity label of 'EntityState' Medium Sensor messages

param.name: Compute Progress
param.desc: True if plan progress should be computed

param.name: Fuel Prediction
param.desc: True if plan's fuel prediction should be computed

param.name: Perform Calibration
param.desc: True if calibration should be performed at all

param.name: Abort On Failed Activation
param.desc: Abort when a payload fails to activate

param.name: StationKeeping Speed in RPM
param.desc: Speed in RPM for the station keeping

param.name: IMU Entity Label
param.desc: Entity label of the IMU for fuel prediction

param.name: Dive depth
param.desc: Depth to dive in response to 'dive' command

param.name: Traveling depth
param.desc: Depth to use when traveling (Goto maneuvers)

param.name: Dive seconds
param.desc: Time to be under water in response to 'dive' command (seconds)

param.name: Loiter radius
param.desc: Radius of generated loiter and station keeping maneuvers

param.name: RPM Speed
param.desc: Speed in RPMs to be used in the generated maneuvers

param.name: Generate At Boot
param.desc: Set of commands for plans to generate at boot

param.name: Execution Frequency
param.desc: Frequência com que a tarefa é executada

param.name: Lost Comms Plan
param.desc: Plan to be executed in case of Lost Communications

param.name: Execution Frequency
param.desc: Frequência com que a tarefa é executada

param.name: Safe Entities
param.desc: Relevant entities when performing a safe plan

param.name: Allows External Control
param.desc: Allow for the vehicle to be externally controlled

param.name: Maneuver Handling Timeout
param.desc: Timeout for starting or stopping a maneuver

param.name: Ignored Interfaces
param.desc: List of interfaces whose services will not be announced

param.name: Loading Order
param.desc: List of messages ordered by loading order

param.name: Reception timeout
param.desc: Maximum amount of seconds to wait for missing fragments in incoming messages

param.name: Transports
param.default: Voltage, Current, FuelLevel, GpsFix, EntityState, CpuUsage, StorageUsage, Heartbeat, Temperature, RSSI, LinkLevel

param.name: Flush Interval
param.desc: Number of second to wait before forcing data to be written to disk

param.name: Transports
param.default: Acceleration, AngularVelocity, Announce, AutopilotMode, ControlLoops, CpuUsage, Current, DesiredHeading, DesiredPath, DesiredRoll, DesiredSpeed, DesiredVerticalRate, DesiredZ, EntityList, EntityState, EstimatedState, EstimatedStreamVelocity, FollowReference, FollowRefState, FuelLevel, GpsFix, IndicatedSpeed, LeaderState, LinkLevel, LogBookEntry, MagneticField, ManeuverControlState, PathControlState, PlanControl, PlanSpecification, PlanControlState, PlanDB, PowerChannelControl, Pressure, Reference, Rpm, RSSI, SetControlSurfaceDeflection, SetThrusterActuation, SimulatedState, StopManeuver, StorageUsage, Temperature, TrueSpeed, TrexObservation, TrexPlan, TrexToken, TrueSpeed, VehicleCommand, VehicleMedium, VehicleState, Voltage

param.name: Serial Port - Device
param.desc: Serial port device used to communicate with the sensor

param.name: Local Port
param.desc: Local UDP port to listen on

param.name: Static Destinations
param.desc: List of <IPv4>:<Port> destinations that will always receive outgoing messages

param.name: Rate Limiters
param.default: CpuUsage:0.2, EntityState:1, EstimatedState:5, FuelLevel:0.1, SimulatedState:0.5, StorageUsage:0.05, Temperature:0.1

param.name: Filtered Entities
param.desc: List of <Message>:<Entity>+<Entity> that define the source entities allowed to pass message of a specific message type.

param.name: Announce Service
param.desc: Announce this transport to services or not

param.name: Underwater Communications
param.desc: Allow underwater communication when limited comms are being simulated

param.name: Transports
param.default: Acceleration, AngularVelocity, AutopilotMode, CpuUsage, Current, DesiredPath, DesiredRoll, DesiredSpeed, DesiredVerticalRate, DesiredZ, EntityList, EntityParameters, EntityState, EstimatedState, EstimatedStreamVelocity, FollowRefState, FuelLevel, GpsFix, Heartbeat, IndicatedSpeed, LeaderState, LinkLevel, LogBookControl, LoggingControl, MagneticField, OperationalLimits, PathControlState, PlanControl, PlanControlState, PlanDB, PlanGeneration, PlanSpecification, PowerChannelControl, Pressure, QueryEntityParameters, RemoteActionsRequest, Rpm, RSSI, SaveEntityParameters, SetEntityParameters, SetServoPosition, SimulatedState, StorageUsage, Target, Temperature, TrexOperation, TrueSpeed, VehicleMedium, VehicleState, Voltage

param.name: Always Transmitted Messages
param.desc: List of messages that will always be transmitted disregarding communication limitations
